archimate:ArchimateModel.name: LSST
archimate:ArchimateModel.purpose:
This is a model that aspires to capture the NCSA LSST construction project, which leads to the the Operations phase LSST Data Facility.
The model supports NCSA internal Construction project Work Breakdown Strucutre, which captures NCSA's forseen activities. These activies are covered by many funding sources: DM construction, LSST Commissioning , and other LSST related funding sources.

properties.value:
This form illustrates the Form plugin for Archi.
It creates controls showing up some Archi components' properties. It replaces the description field by the value of property "description_xxx" if it exists, where "xxx" is the value of the model's property "language".
For instance, if the model has got a "language" property with value "fr", then the "documentation" field will be replaced by the value of the property "documentation_fr" if any.
